#### Land Development Services Alert:

CONTACT INFORMATION:  Monday through Thursday, 8 a.m. - 4 p.m. and Friday, 9:15 a.m. - 4 p.m. Please note that visitors may not be added to in-person queues past 3:45 p.m.

# Permit Library: Address Changes

## ON THIS PAGE

  * Address Change
  * Street Name Change



## Address Change

All addresses in Fairfax County are assigned by Facilitation and Addressing Center (FAC) staff in compliance with all county codes and regulations. Addresses cannot be added to the Master Address Repository (MAR) by GIS until a PLUS application is submitted.

Learn More

## Street Name Change

Street names in Fairfax County are assigned by the Facilitation and Addressing Center (FAC) staff in compliance with all county codes and regulations. An application must be submitted in PLUS for consideration. FAC staff verifies that all requirements of your request have been completed and submits your request for approval to the Fairfax County Board of Supervisors.

Learn More

  
Need Help? Call **703-222-0801** , **TTY 711**.

Monday through Thursday from 8 a.m. to 4 p.m. and Friday from 9:15 a.m. to 4 p.m.

  * LDS Permit Library: Access guides to navigate every record type in PLUS.
  * Letters to Industry: Subscribe for LDS announcements, notices, and tech bulletins.
  * Meet With Staff: Find a staff member to help you with the permit process.
